item.title: Second Session
item.description:
Event Details

The second session will again consist of two parts‚Äîjust like the first one! ü§ì
We‚Äôll start with a roundtable where new participants can share their research interests, areas of expertise, and the NLP subtopics they‚Äôre passionate about. Then, we’ll transition into a Birds-of-a-Feather-style session for lively group discussions.

The second part of the session will feature a coding workshop. üñ•Ô∏è

We‚Äôre currently selecting topics for both parts, and we encourage you to join our Discord server to weigh in on the discussion. To receive a link to our Discord server, please fill out the form on the home page (if you haven‚Äôt already). üöÄ

item.title: About the Community
item.description:
General Information

Our community connects students with shared interests in NLP and fosters discussions on exciting topics.
Most events will be held in person. üé§üë•

What are BoFs?

BoFs (Birds-of-a-Feather sessions) are informal gatherings where people discuss shared interests in ML/NLP. They provide a relaxed space to exchange ideas, tackle challenges, and explore new research directions. Here are a few examples from past conferences:

  • EMNLP 2023 BoF Sessions
  • COLING 2025 BoF Sessions
  • ACL 2023 BoF Calls
